name: Fallen London - Remove Specific Discard Buttons
description: This removes the Discard button from a number of cards so there's no risk to click the button by mistake. This is mostly for cards you want to keep around and not discard by accident; such as the mood cards.
css:
@-moz-document domain("fallenlondon.com")
{
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="10133"] button, /* Docks (Parabolan Panthers) */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="10135"] button, /* Bohemians (Parabolan Panthers) */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="10153"] button, /* Society (Parabolan Panthers / Mirrorcatch Boxes) */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="10800"] button, /* The Tower of Sun and Moon: a Reservation at the Royal Bethlehem Hotel */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="10802"] button, /* The Lofty Tower: The Potential of Premises at the Bazaar */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="11208"] button, /* A Moment's Peace */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="11529"] button, /* Call In Favours in the Flit */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="13353"] button, /* A dream about a window at night */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="13368"] button, /* A Little Omen (mood) */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="13373"] button, /* A Dusty Bookshop (mood) */
div.hand__card-container[data-event-id="14881"] button, /* A Contact in the Great Game has a Tale for you */

}
